response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us and we believe it will also be a valuable asset for you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering its worth to you is estimated at $800,000. We are confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
